languages.text: {n}Рыжий великан бледнеет, в голосе его трещит убийственный мороз Фенриса.{/n} "Ты ответишь за это, Ксавьер Калькасар. Я объявляю тебе кровную месть. Я объявляю тебе смерть".

{n}Ulfar stares coldly at him, the deadly frost of Fenris crackling in his voice as he speaks:{/n} "You will pay for this, Xavier Calcazar. Know that I will have my blood vengeance. I will have your death."
languages.original_text: {n}Рыжий великан бледнеет, в голосе его трещит убийственный мороз Фенриса.{/n} "Ты ответишь за это, Ксавьер Калькасар. Я объявляю тебе кровную месть. Я объявляю тебе смерть".

traits.locale_text: {n}The read-headed giant grows pale, in his voice crackles the deadly frost of Fenris.{/n} "You will pay for this, Xavier Calcazar. I declare a blood feud to you. I declare you dead."
{n}The read-headed giant grows pale, in his voice crackles the deadly frost of Fenris.{/n} "You will pay for this, Xavier Calcazar. I declare a blood feud to you. I declare you dead."
{n}The red-headed giant grows pale, the deadly frost of Fenris crackling in his voice.{/n} "You'll pay for this, Xavier Calcazar. I declare a blood feud to you. I declare you dead."
{n}The red-headed giant grows pale, the deadly frost of Fenris crackling in his voice.{/n} "You'll pay for this, Xavier Calcazar. I declare a blood feud to you. I declare you dead."
{n}Ulfar grows pale, the deadly frost of Fenris crackling in his voice as he speaks:{/n} "You will pay for this, Xavier Calcazar. Know that I will have my blood vengeance. I will have your death."

{n}Ulfar stares coldly at him, the deadly frost of Fenris crackling in his voice as he speaks:{/n} "You will pay for this, Xavier Calcazar. Know that I will have my blood vengeance. I will have your death."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar le fixe froidement du regard et annonce d'une voix plus glaciale que Fenris :{/n} « Vous le paierez, Xavier Calcazar. Ma vengeance sera terrible. Vous n'en réchapperez pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar stares coldly at him, the deadly frost of Fenris crackling in his voice as he speaks:{/n} "You will pay for this, Xavier Calcazar. Know that I will have my blood vengeance. I will have your death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar blêmit et annonce d'une voix plus glaciale que Fenris :{/n} « Vous le paierez, Xavier Calcazar. Ma vengeance sera terrible. Vous n'en réchapperez pas. »

languages.text: {n}Ulfar le mira con frialdad y la gelidez letal de Fenris restalla en su voz cuando habla.{/n} «Pagarás por esto, Xavier Calcazar. Que sepas que me cobraré mi venganza de sangre. Morirás a mis manos».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar stares coldly at him, the deadly frost of Fenris crackling in his voice as he speaks:{/n} "You will pay for this, Xavier Calcazar. Know that I will have my blood vengeance. I will have your death."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gigante pelirrojo palidece y el frío letal de Fenris restalla en su voz.{/n} «Pagarás por esto, Xavier Calcazar. Declaro una deuda de sangre contigo. Te declaro hombre muerto».

languages.text: {n}乌尔法冷冷地盯着他，芬里斯致命的冰霜在他的声音中噼啪作响。{/n}“你要为此付出代价，希维尔·卡尔卡扎。我必将血债血偿，我会亲手杀了你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar stares coldly at him, the deadly frost of Fenris crackling in his voice as he speaks:{/n} "You will pay for this, Xavier Calcazar. Know that I will have my blood vengeance. I will have your death."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法脸色变得铁青，芬里斯致命的冰霜在他的声音中噼啪作响。{/n}“你要付出代价，希维尔·卡尔卡扎。我宣布，你和我结下了血仇。我宣布，你已经是个死人了。”

languages.text: {n}Ulfar starrt ihn kalt an. Der tödliche Frost von Fenris knistert in seiner Stimme:{/n} "Dafür werdet Ihr bezahlen, Xavier Calcazar. Wisset, dass ich meine Blutrache nehmen werde. Ich werde Euch töten."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar stares coldly at him, the deadly frost of Fenris crackling in his voice as he speaks:{/n} "You will pay for this, Xavier Calcazar. Know that I will have my blood vengeance. I will have your death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der rothaarige Riese erblasst, der tödliche Frost von Fenris knistert in seiner Stimme.{/n} "Dafür werdet Ihr bezahlen, Xavier Calcazar. Ich erkläre Euch die Blutfehde. Ich erkläre Euch für tot."

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは冷徹に彼を睨みつける。フェンリスの致死の霜がその声に響いていた。{/n}「お前は報いを受けるのだ、ザビエル・カルカサル。お前に血の抗争を宣言する。その死を宣告してやろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar stares coldly at him, the deadly frost of Fenris crackling in his voice as he speaks:{/n} "You will pay for this, Xavier Calcazar. Know that I will have my blood vengeance. I will have your death."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは冷徹に彼を睨みつける。フェンリスの致死の霜がその声に響いていた。{/n}「お前は報いを受けるのだ、ザビエル・カルカサル。お前に血の抗争を宣言する。その死を宣告してやろう」

languages.text: {n}Ulfar ona soğukça bakıyor ve konuşmaya başladığında Fenris'in ölümcül soğuğu, sesiyle birlikte esiyor.{/n} "Bunun bedelini ödeyeceksin Xavier Calcazar. Kanımın intikamını alacağım, bunu sakın unutma. Seni ellerimle öldüreceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar stares coldly at him, the deadly frost of Fenris crackling in his voice as he speaks:{/n} "You will pay for this, Xavier Calcazar. Know that I will have my blood vengeance. I will have your death."
